title: Lemon poppy seed tea loaf cakes
ingredients: ['200g plain flour', '100g caster sugar', '1 tablespoon poppy seeds', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 tablespoon grated lemon zest', '150g natural yoghurt', '75g butter, melted', '1 egg, beaten', '1 egg yolk, beaten', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
